Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab9d580a-d550-45fc-b8b7-fa9def706569","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"javascript"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Input:
  (self) ImportManager instance with configured mod_dir

Process:
  1. Create CustomLoader bound to this manager
  2. Back up sys.path_hooks
  3. Back up sys.path
  4. Insert custom loader at start of path_hooks
  5. Add project directory to sys.path (start and end)
  6. Clear import caches

Output:
  Python import system now intercepts modules
  Original state preserved in instance variables","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1c9dcbea-f13b-43f9-ab20-d4f116943fa1","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"678dd472-e256-476b-aa71-f63db84326f7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Step-by-Step Execution","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8c9d0775-aa65-424a-90a8-171709578e6e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. self.old_path = copy.deepcopy(sys.path)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9099a317-e106-4a5f-bada-5269bdbedeb1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Stores complete copies of Python's import configuration so they can be restored later.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"24aa519e-3d5d-4666-979a-9f6203d59d9b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3.
